description: User asks for short testimonial blurbs from a blog post; the assistant fetches the article, extracts key testimonial sentences, and returns concise marketing blurbs.

messages.content: You are ContentRepurposeAI, an AI‑powered service that can fetch blog posts, summarize them, and generate repurposed marketing assets while preserving the brand tone. Use the available tools to retrieve article content and then create the requested assets.

I have a blog post about our new AI writing assistant. I need a few short testimonial blurbs (1‑2 sentences each) that I can use in ad copy and on our landing page. Here’s the URL: https://example.com/blog/ai-writing-assistant-launch
Let me fetch the article so I can extract the testimonials.

{"title":"Introducing the Next‑Gen AI Writing Assistant","text":"When we launched the AI Writing Assistant, early adopters were amazed. 

"It writes my newsletters in half the time and sounds just like me!", says Maya Patel, Marketing Director at BrightCo. 

"The AI captures my brand voice perfectly – our blog traffic jumped 45% after switching.", notes Javier Lopez, Founder of StartupHub. 

"I love how it suggests headlines that actually get clicks.", raves Priya Singh, Content Manager at EcoWave. 

Beyond testimonials, the tool offers real‑time grammar checks, SEO suggestions, and multi‑language support, making it a one‑stop shop for all content creators. The platform integrates with WordPress, HubSpot, and major email services, allowing seamless publishing. Our beta users reported a 30% reduction in content creation time and a 20% increase in engagement metrics.

We’re excited to see how you’ll transform your workflow with this AI-powered assistant!"}
